original: 袁紹渡河追擊，在黃河南岸攻擊運糧車隊，引發延津之戰。受命前往劫掠糧食的軍隊被誘入埋伏，袁紹另一位大將在此殞命。
text: Yuan Shao pursued across the river and attacked the grain transport convoy on the south bank of the Yellow River, triggering the Battle of Yanjin. The army ordered to looting food was lured into an ambush, and another general of Yuan Shao died here.
